alert.note: Alert for Spokane Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 2:05PM PST until December 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Cheney, Moscow, Worley, Hayden, Potlatch, Davenport, Downtown Spokane, Coeur d`Alene, Plummer, Spokane Valley, Rockford, Fairfield, Post Falls, Genesee, and Airway Heights. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Idaho, for the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
